abort.not_supported: A Raspberry pi board is not detected, make sure that your kernel is recent and the hardware is supported
abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

user.description: Do you want to start set up?

deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Raspberry Pi GPIO using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the Raspberry Pi GPIO YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
deprecated_yaml.title: The Raspberry Pi GPIO YAML configuration is being removed

error.same_port: Relay pin and state pin can't be the same.

data.binary_sensors: Select pins to use as binary sensors
data.bouncetime: The time in milliseconds for port debouncing
data.invert_logic: Set input port to ACTIVE_LOW (default is ACTIVE_HIGH)
data.pull_mode: Type of internal pull resistor to use

data.invert_relay: Set the relay pin output to ACTIVE_HIGH
data.invert_state: Set input port to ACTIVE_LOW (default is ACTIVE_HIGH)
data.relay_pin: Select pin to use as relay
data.state_pin: Select pin to use as sensor
data.state_pull_mode: Type of internal pull resistor to use

data.invert_logic: Invert the output logic to ACTIVE LOW
data.switches: Select pins to use as switches
